review: Very nice experience with the doctor well explained and give gud support, suggestions and well directed by the doctor.yes it was very gud experience

Dr. Anand Sagari's professional and insightful discussion and explanation of my diabetes significantly eased my anxiety. Her experience and skill in dealing with people are reflected in her words. Moreover, the treatment she prescribed has greatly improved my condition.
reply_text: Really glad to hear that sir, wishing you the best of health

review:
I had a very bad experience with Dr. Ananda Sagari. I had suspected covid and she suggested same CT chest screening and multiple blood tests 3 times within a period 10 days. After second tests I took consultation from a senior pulmonigist ** **** ******** *** *** ****** ***** ** *** *** ****** ********* **** ***** * ***** **** *** ****** ** *** ** ********

I am very disappointed with the doctor's treatment. Won't visit the doctor and Sunshine Hospital in future.

*************** ***** *** **********
reply_text: Sorry for your experience but in view of covid positive condition of you CT SCREEN CHEST CBP ESR and CRP are basic needed for your own good.but as mentioned by you you have recovered with my treatment , yet your CT SCORE increased from 4/25 to 6/26 , feeling better and also  you have discussed regarding your kids are covid positive .unfortunately covid tests are needed but glad you recovered with  treatment . Wishing you good health.

review: Got to know that this doctor doesn't treat children of 17 years. Not sure of this strange reason. If at all there is such if age limit then these specifics should be asked while booking the appointment. It was a last minute rejection to attend the patient. Either these things should be dealt by practo or the doctor should have some valid reason mentioned in prior.
reply_text: Hello satyakiran, first of all anyone above the age of 10 isn't in peadiatric group and no doctor would say no to treating, guess you had some miscommunication at the reception so it should be communicated at apollo desk, will do from your behalf.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Took my parents for in person consultation at Sunshine hospitals.  Her approach of listening to patients is highly appreciated. Speaks perfect telugu which helped to communicate with my parents better in knowing their health problems. She tried her best to address the patient's problem with general medicine before suggesting to visit a specialist.I would not hesitate to recommend Dr. Sagari to anyone who is looking for a general physician. You are doing a great job Dr. Sagari in the days of pandemic around. Thank you for your service.
reply_text: Thanku mr.madan, I'm really glad  that you liked my approach &consultation .Happy patients make a happy doctor.wishing your parents best of health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Ananda was really patient enough to go through my reports and explain what the reports meant and what are the changes that I need to make with my life style in order to over come the problems I am facing currently and might face down the lane if ignored.Over all it was a pleasant experince where I walked in confused and came out with positivity and confidence.
reply_text: Thank you ,glad you liked the whole consultation.wishing you the best of health üëçüèª

review: The consultation was nice and convenient. There was no waiting period at all. The doctor was good. She wrote a few required tests for diagnosis. The treatment was planned accordingly and I found it to be accurate and helpful for my recovery. I am absolutely happy with the entire experience.

It took a while for the consultation due to the doctor's unavailability at the time. *** *** ******* *** **** ***** She prescribed me *** ****** medicine which was very useful in recovery. No further follow up or medical tests were required. I am happy with the doctor.

I was the second patient and there was no need to wait too long for the consultation. The doctor was very good. I only had some mild pain hence she didn't suggest any medical tests or procedures. Only some medications were prescribed after the proper analysis. It worked fine to me and I am feeling well now. I would surely recommend the doctor to everyone.

reply_text: Sorry you had to face  trouble all through your way, but you had not mentioned your name or details so I cant recollect either.
